item.title: Climate & Health Event Series, Science Policy Group
item.description: One of the roles I undertook as Vice-President of the Harvard graduate student science policy group was co-organizing a series of events at the intersection of climate & health. This brought together students and staff from across the Harvard School of Public Health, Medical School, Dental School, and Graduate School of Arts & Sciences. In particular, I spearheaded and moderated a panel and networking dinner focused on the translation of research into policy.

item.title: Review Editor for the Fifth National Climate Assessment, Focus on Western Wildfires
item.description: I helped coordinate response to public comments for the cross-cutting feature on western wildfires.
